duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high quality service to assist brokers with quoting, answer questions, and provide overall customer service.
Daily monitoring open new business and renewal quotes, including follow up with brokers as needed.
Complete new business installs, including documentation collection, adding new plans, entering account information, creating group structure, and completing system requirements.
Complete renewal process for existing customers, updating account information and adding new plans.
Maintain current working knowledge of underwriting guidelines and state regulations regarding small group business regulations.
Update systems/trackers with current account status during the installation/renewal process.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required, bachelor’s degree preferred
